unalcol.optimization.binary.testbed

Class BoundedlyDeceptive

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.algorithm.ThreadFunction<I,O>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Function<BitArray,java.lang.Double>

    public class BoundedlyDeceptive
extends OptimizationFunction<BitArray>

    Title: BoundedlyDeceptive

    Description: The OptimizationFunction of a binary array is the 4-order bounded deceptive function as proposed by Goldberg

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Company: Kunsamu

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez

      • getValue

        public int getValue(BitArray genes,
                    int start,
                    int length)
        Return the integer value codified by the bits in a section of the array
        Parameters:
        genes - Bitarray source
        start - Index of the first bit in the section to extract the index
        length - Size of the section from which the integer is extracted
        Returns:
        The integer value codified by the bits in a section of the array
